title: Windows Vista SP1 x86 Game Edition 2008 RUS version
description:
Windows Vista SP1 x86 Game Edition 2008 Russian version v.5.1
-------------------------------------------------- -----------

Before you light, fast, netrebovatelnaya resources to next-generation operating system - Windows Vista with integrated final update SP1.

************************
Installation instructions:
************************

- Save the image of the assembly of Windows on the minimum speed for a normal blank DVD using one of the programs: Nero, Small CD-Writer, Alcohol 120%, PowerLaser Express, etc.
- Restarts comes in the BIOS (the button "Delete" (a notebook "F2")) and exposes BOOT bootable CD-ROM
- Reboot and when will appear on the screen marked "Press any key to boot from CD or DVD", press the space
- Everything went installation.

**********
Activation:
**********

1) Run vistaloader_2.1.2.11_32-64bit.exe as an administrator.
2) In the resulting window select the manufacturer and push for the big button with the logo Activation.
